document.full_text: the obama administration on wednesday urged a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit that challenged a decision allowing unapproved drugs to be imported from overseas for use in executions of death row inmates.
document.title: us wants lawsuit over execution drug dismissed
lines_and_colors: the obama administration on wednesday urged a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit that challenged a decision allowing unapproved drugs to be imported from overseas for use in executions of death row inmates.
